topics.body:
Imagine having the power of God but each decision you make requires 10 years of waiting until it happens.

What would you do in the first century on an existing world and existing population?
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976

topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55876e3263687212f3001043#post_55876e3263687212f3001043

Be all loving to draw them on a false sense of security for the first century, right after that become full tyrant without warning for the second century, then completely disappear for a millennia to make them wonder if I ever existed. Then come back and wipe them all out.
